Nov 15 (Reuters) - Appaloosa LP: : *APPALOOSA LP DISSOLVES SHARE STAKE IN NETFLIX INC - SEC FILING *APPALOOSA LP CUTS SHARE STAKE IN AMAZON BY 44% TO 70,000 SHARES - SEC FILING *APPALOOSA LP RAISES SHARE STAKE IN OCCIDENTAL BY 16.3% TO 6.6 MILLION SHARES - SEC FILING *APPALOOSA LP - CHANGE IN HOLDINGS ARE AS OF SEPTEMBER 30, 2021 AND COMPARED WITH THE PREVIOUS QUARTER ENDED AS OF JUNE 30, 2021


((Reuters Investor Briefs; email: reutersinvestor.briefs@thomsonreuters.com)) Source Date/Time = 15-NOV-202121:08:00.203 GMT
